name: Atop the Witch's Tower WS
description:
Your name is MARY. You are a WITCH, and you find your perspective compacted to the size of a small, relatively niche handheld!

This is Atop the Witch's Tower WS, a port of the short, lovely ZZT game by John Thyer to the WonderSwan and WonderSwan Color. It also serves as a proof of concept for running ZZT games on the WonderSwan in general, as well as for the upcoming toolchain I'm working on.

This project wouldn't have been possible without the efforts of Dox, trap15, FluBBa, Godzil, GuyPerfect, Near, and many others who helped figure out the WonderSwan's mysteries; as well as developers who maintain important components of the toolchain, most notably TK Chia. Thank you! I would also like to thank jix and Tharo for the support and trust placed in me.

In addition, I'd like to personally thank the modern ZZT community for being awesome as always.

This is only the beginning of what can be done with the WonderSwan - stay tuned, or find out what's already being done!

Previously:

  • Atop The Witch's Tower GB
